Question
========
  
Suppose crime had not been measured using a standardized IQ test, but using the two categories of "high IQ" and "low IQ." What analysis technique should then be used to analyze the relationship between crime and intelligence? 
Answerlist
----------
* Spearman correlation.
* T-test for independent groups .
* Chi-square test for independence .
* Chi-square Goodness-of-Fit test.
